example.eg: The engineer integrated the customer's demands into his plans.
example.egtrans: 工程师将顾客的需求并入到他的方案中。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使成整体，使一体化, 纳入，并入

example.eg: Dan's school was one of the last in the country to integrate minorities.
example.egtrans: 丹的学校是全国最后几所融合少数民族的学校之一。

example.eg: People complained that the new arrivals in the village weren't integrating.
example.egtrans: 村民抱怨新来的人无法融入村子。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 融和, 混合, 合并

example.eg: The school waited to integrate until a few other schools attempted it.
By the end of the sixties, all the restaurants in the area were integrated.
